docs.text: window.noltQueue=window.noltQueue||[];function nolt(){noltQueue.push(arguments)} nolt('init', { url: 'https://dungoneery.nolt.io', selector: '.nolt' }); Welcome to Dungoneery Docs! # The server can get pretty complicated at some point, so I have created those beautiful dark mode docs for you! SPOILER ALERT Docs sometimes contain major spoilers to the game ! Every page that contains any kind of spoilers will have a warning on top, so be careful not to miss it ! give feedback (function() { var d = document, s = d.createElement('script'); s.src = 'https://dungoneery.disqus.com/embed.js'; s.setAttribute('data-timestamp', +new Date()); (d.head || d.body).appendChild(s); })(); Please enable JavaScript to view the comment section.

docs.title: Welcome to Dungoneery Docs!

docs.text: Base Plot Concept # "The Zombie attacks have gotten pretty rough lately... They are basically storming the Village each night ! We won't be able to resist them any longer if this keeps up! I have a feeling that something bad is happening somewhere across this land..." ~ Joe the Town Mayor Who is going to discover the cursed secrets behind this weird phenomenon, if not you? Go Great Hero, investigate this problem before it is too late... Plot Explained The Village you live in is under many unusual Zombie attacks. The raiders are way smarter than usual, making them tough opponents. Being close to downfall of the entire town, the Town Hall has made the decision to send the best of the Heroes to investigate the source of those Raids. Basic Mechanics # Hotbar # The first thing you will notice is that the base HUD of default Minecraft is completely different. The things that have changed are: Food Bar is gone, as it is irrelevant to the gameplay. Health Bar is now gone, replaced with a giant Hardcore Heart on your left side of the screen . Armor Bar is gone, its display was moved into the Inventory to the Stat Row . Experience Bar is gone, changed into Mana Bar that refills over time. You have only 1 row of Inventory free to your management, as the Ender Chest is much bigger now. The Hotbar has now a new and unchangable layout: (ordered counting from left to right) 1 st slot is for a Melee Weapon . 2 nd slot s for a Ranged Weapon . 3 rd slot is now reserved for a Potion of your desires. 4 th slot is Arrows (or other projectiles) . 5 th , 6 th and 7 th slot are reserved for Artifacts , Spells and other equipable items . Last 2 slots are special slots for Gadget Star and an equipable gadgets of your choice. Second Hand slot is reserved for Trinkets . All Armor slots are free to use for both cosmetics and actual armor. (function() { var d = document, s = d.createElement('script'); s.src = 'https://dungoneery.disqus.com/embed.js'; s.setAttribute('data-timestamp', +new Date()); (d.head || d.body).appendChild(s); })(); Please enable JavaScript to view the comment section.

Health Bar is now gone, replaced with a giant Hardcore Heart on your left side of the screen . Armor Bar is gone, its display was moved into the Inventory to the Stat Row . The Hotbar has now a new and unchangable layout: (ordered counting from left to right) 1 st slot is for a Melee Weapon . 2 nd slot s for a Ranged Weapon . 3 rd slot is now reserved for a Potion of your desires. 4 th slot is Arrows (or other projectiles) . 5 th , 6 th and 7 th slot are reserved for Artifacts , Spells and other equipable items . All Armor slots are free to use for both cosmetics and actual armor. docs.text: Foka's Magical Tasklist of Pure Sadness and Sleep Deprivation # FMTPSSD for short Pre-release # Core OpenAudioMC API Music Own Player Stats Tablist Chat formatting Internal APIs ParticleAPI ColorAPI (ColorUtils) WandAPI MobAPI SKill Ranks VIP Prefix Special Map Area on Spawn Tablist Perks SVIP Prefix Special Map Area on Spawn Tablist Perks MVIP Prefix Special Map Area on Spawn Tablist Perks MVIP+ Prefix Special Map Area on Spawn Tablist Perks Maps There are 6 total maps - 3 big , 2 fillers and 1 extra stage (large) Spawn Story Cutscene Soundtrack Lectors Map Areas Secrets Mild Meadows Enemies Boss Fight Story Cutscene Soundtrack Lectors Map Areas Secrets Nameless Stage 2 Nameless Stage 3 Nameless Stage 4 Creepy Thicket Enemies Boss Fight Story Cutscene Soundtrack Lectors Map Areas Secrets Nameless Extra Stage Mobs Enchanter Lava Golem Husk Buff Wraith Minibosses Ambient Mobs Super Vex Some of Incendium's Mobs Items Artifacts Armor Sets Melee Weapons Ranged Weapons Trinkets Potions Consumables Cosmetics Pandora's Vault Capes Pets Other Website Discussions Immage Gallery Complete Wiki (function() { var d = document, s = d.createElement('script'); s.src = 'https://dungoneery.disqus.com/embed.js'; s.setAttribute('data-timestamp', +new Date()); (d.head || d.body).appendChild(s); })(); Please enable JavaScript to view the comment section.
